description:
'''HexD''' is a [[microgenre]] of [[hip-hop]] and [[electronic music]] that emerged in the late 2010s to early 2020s, characterized by heavy use of [[Bitcrusher|bitcrushing]] mixed with sped-up and [[Pitch shifting|pitched]]-up vocals, resulting in a distorted, digital, hazy, and [[Psychedelic music|psychedelic]] sound.

Notable acts include $pirit Gurlz, Fax Gang, Hexcastcrew, Sienna Sleep, Yabujin, purity://filter, and Reptilian Club Boyz.
